resources.string:
Welcome to Bookmarker.

Bookmarker is a very simple app which allows you to reorder and delete the bookmarks used in the G1's web browser.
Simple.

Source code at: http://code.google.com/p/androidbookmarker

GeekYouUp 2009
\n\nYou don\'t have any bookmarks at the moment, Bookmarker will now close.
